snippet: Muscle Shoals, Ala., was the unlikely site of historic soul, rock and country recordings by everyone from Aretha Franklin and Wilson Pickett to Paul Simon and the Rolling Stones.
abstract: Contribution made to American music history by FAME Recording Studios is rediscovered when 2013 documentary about company spurs book release and plans for television series; studio, founded by Rick Hall in tiny Deep South town of Muscle Shoals, Ala, is place where memorable soul, rock and country albums were recorded during 1960s and 1970s.
lead_paragraph: Muscle Shoals, Ala., was the unlikely site of historic soul, rock and country recordings by everyone from Aretha Franklin and Wilson Pickett to Paul Simon and the Rolling Stones.

headline.main: The Muscle Shoals Sound Finally Gets Its Due
headline.print_headline: The Sound of the Shoals Gets Its Due
